DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to determine the concentration of anecortave acetate (15 or 30 mg versus placebo) that is safe and effective for the inhibition of the growth of blood vessels in the retina in patients with wet AMD.
DOC.brief_title: A Phase II Study of Anecortave Acetate for the Treatment of Exudative Age-Related Macular Degeneration
DOC.criteria: Ages 50 years and over Other protocoldefined inclusion and exclusion criteria may apply.
